summary: This bill, the District of Columbia Policing Protection Act (H.R. 5143), aims to establish standards for vehicular pursuits by law enforcement officers in the District of Columbia. It amends the Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022 to alter limitations on pursuits.  The bill mandates officers engage in pursuits unless certain conditions exist and requires the Department of Justice to evaluate the adoption of PursuitAlert technology and report its findings to relevant congressional committees.
